title: Clash - Bronze/Silver Duo Bot or mid/adc/supp
body:
Looking for a duo bot to compliment our clash team, silver or bronze elo ~tier IV. If you're an adc or support without a duo looking for a clash team, still chuck us a friend request and I'll see what I can do. A positive attitude is very welcome as is a microphone. Send us a friend request if you meet any of the criteria or are just wanting a game or two.

Cheers fellas,
Harlaquin

replies.body: Im a sup main add me
